aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The Material aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation based on VDA material classification and also covering chemical, thermal, and physical properties as well as material states, formats, and uncertainty information, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.
Classification of the material according to defined standards.

The Material aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation based on VDA material classification and also covering chemical, thermal, and physical properties as well as material states, formats, and uncertainty information, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The Material aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation based on VDA material classification and also covering chemical, thermal, and physical properties as well as material states, formats, and uncertainty information, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.
Characterisation of Materials Thermal: Information about the material's behaviour under various thermal conditions.
Characterisation of Materials Chemical: Description of the chemical composition and properties of the material.
The physical state of the material.
Format of material in the process step.
Status of the material in the process step
A refined subset of a Material Group that classifies materials according to detailed technical distinctions such as alloying type, polymer family, manufacturing process, or functional properties.
A more specific subdivision within a Material Category. It organizes materials into technical families that share similar composition, structure, and performance characteristics.
The highest-level classification that groups materials into broad, fundamental classes based on their overall nature and fundamental properties.
Standard according to which the material is classified.
Classification of the material according to defined standards.
The waste code is used to identify the type of waste on part or material level.
The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.
